itunes:title: Genesis Week 5 with Kelly Minter
title: Genesis Week 5 with Kelly Minter
description:
Raechel and Amanda are back with Kelly Minter to wrap up the last week of the SRT Genesis reading plan. They dive into the tumultuous story of Joseph, a man whose life proves suffering and blessing aren't mutually exclusive. From his heaven-born dreams to the depths of prison, all the way to the second highest office in Egypt, God was with Joseph. Kelly and our hosts talk about the power of God to bring goodness from the most trying of circumstances and the sort of faith that would make a dying man ask that his bones be buried in a distant land.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth Genesis: Back to the Beginning reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the Genesis collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com.


Save 15% on our 2020 Lent Collection, His Love Endures when you use the code LENT15. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/genesis-week-5/
